name: Buenas No Chess
description:
Buenas No Chess is no ordinary Chess game. At your turn, you have to choose between to random moves.

The game will try to select one attack game and ont move game when possible.

The chess rules are simplified: To win you have to take the king.

Control

You control the game with the keyboard or by clicking on the corresponding buttons on the screen (it should work on tablets).

Player 1: Left and Right arrows

Player 2: A and D keys

Beginner mode

In beginner mode, you have as much time as you want to choose your move. You can't reroll the proposed moves.

Advanced mode

In advanced mode, the proposed moves are rerolled every 6 seconds. But it goes with a cost: the more you use this feature, the faster your life goes down at each turn. If your life reach 0, you loose!
